item.title: Hello, world.
item.description: Hello, world. I thought I’d build a personal website just for fun, and, since I’ve been wanting to learn Go, I decided to pick up Hugo, the static-site generator. This is my first post. It took about an hour to set everything up with GitHub Pages– not bad! I’ll use this space as a scratchpad to try various features. Various features How about code blocks? import this x = [1, 2, 3] And images?
